channel.title: Midi Keyboard objects inside Subpatch our outside? (best practice)
channel.description:
Hello - I am wondering about the best practices of using a midi keyboard in object when dealing with subpatches.
At the moment I have a keyboard object connected to quite a few nodes inside a subpatch. The subpatch is then simply placed in a regular patch, as a polyphonic object, and goes to a stereo out.
I am now thinking of adding another voice to the instrument but not sure if I should take out the midi keyboard object from my subpatches and replace it with inlets.
Is the recommended approach to take out midi keyboard objects from subpatches and place them in the master patch, or it doesn't matter?

item.title: Midi Keyboard objects inside Subpatch our outside? (best practice)
item.dc:creator: @alexk alex
item.description:
@alexk wrote:

ok thanks that's perfect.

Read full topic
item.source: Midi Keyboard objects inside Subpatch our outside? (best practice)
